title: Optimizer state dict should be defaultdict when loading
body_html:
The state attribute in the opt. class is a defaultdict which helps to add new parameter states in the state dict as they are being used while training. Once the optimizer's state_dict is saved and loaded, the state attribute is a dict and not a defaultdict which assumes that before saving, all the parameters in the network are present in the state dict.

When loading the opt. using a saved state_dict the state attribute should be a defaultdict.
I currently do the following to have this behavior

o.load_state_dict(torch.load(path))
o.state = defaultdict(dict, o.state)

Corresponding PyTorch-Discuss post
@soumith
